entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Smithers
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:48 PM PST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 4.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Smithers Airport 3:00 PM PST Sunday 19 February 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 4.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa rising
Visibility: 40.2 km
Humidity: 50 %
Dewpoint: -5.1°C
Wind: NW 17 km/h gust 28 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 1

entry.title: Sunday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 6 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 10 cm. High plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow ending before morning then cloudy. Local blowing snow late in the evening and overnight. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 19 February 2023
